name: Monkey.D.Luffy
text:
If you have 2 or more attached DON!! cards on the field, this Character gains +2000 power.
On Play: You may reveal 2 Event cards from your hand: Play up to 1 red Character with a power of 3000 or less from your hand. Then, give up to 1 rested DON!! card to your Leader or 1 of your Characters.
